data.description:
Customizable freestyle VR drum simulator. Note highway rhythm games 2D/3D included. Must add your own custom songs or beat maps for the highways. Freestyle practice or play your MP3's in-game and make a drum cover like a real kit.

In-game Quest file browser .MP3/.OGG/.WAV audio player.

Position your drums, cymbals, and electronic drum pads where you like. Modify each drum sound by using different drum heads, cymbals, hi-hats.

Tenor drum harness and tenor drums included. (Marching band drums)

Quick Features:
- Save and load your kit
- Pressure sensitive strikes
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals (VR buttons)
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals (USB/Bluetooth Pedal/Gamepad)
- Multiple locations
- Change sounds and look of kit
- Tenor drums
- Xylophone

VR Drum Hardware Included:
8 snare drums, 5 bass drums, also an amped bass drum, 5 crash cymbals, 2 ride cymbals, 3 splash cymbals, tom drums 6", 8", 10", 12", 14". A roto tom rack 6", 8", 10" roto toms, 4 different hi-hats (rock, 50's, metal trash etc), china cymbals, dry ride/crash, custom china stack, mounted tambourine, cow bells, steelpan drum, xylophone and more.

Test Include:
- Liv.tv

Detail: 
The note highway supports .chart drum charts with music. Custom music and drum charts (.chart files and song folders) that must be added yourself.
